title: A Thanks to All Twisted Treeline Players

replies.body:
First it was the Crystal Scar that was removed which murdered the hide and seek community. After that it was the rotating gamemodes that was on every weekend and then just stopped, then there’s the rumours that URF will never return again due to “burnout” and now this. 

This game has nothing to offer anymore apart from toxic, slow placed and boring Summomers Rift and Aram. Now I don’t personally care about the twisted tree line been removed but what about the people that do? Why can’t it remain in customs so people can play if they want? There’s games that came out many years ago that offer more gamemodes or maps in private/custom lobby’s. 

Why doesn’t this company care about what the community wants? I know it’s kind of running gag that Riot doesn’t care but enough is enough!. There are countless forums on here, YouTube, Reddit, surrender@20 etc that has thousands of people BEGGING to have URF remain permanent or have the Crystal Scar back in customs so we can have fun away from the main game in peace but it gets ignored every single time, year after year. 

This game has so much potential to be amazing but instead it remains stale. An example of something to add is the ability to toggle settings in custom games like starting gold, passive gold income per second (like the crystal scar) walk speed, disable minions in lanes etc etc and that way we can create our own hide and seek experiences since you guys refuse to add it back.
OLD SCHOOL LEAGUE OF LEGENDS (OSLOL) PLEASE.
We got the stupid kiddy TFT mode, but lost this?  Sad times.

Could of at least made a little legend vilemaw as a send off not some silly icon that proba looks same as last one i agree it should be left in custom game mode and ye dude crystal scar that takes me back to the gud ol days when league was a less toxic game and they actually banned toxic people more rip good lol i miss u
Just add it to custom lobby.
Will games played in other servers count towards the game count? (I.e. played on NA before OCE was ever a thing)
Let us use the old maps in custom games. please
Icons and emotes? Have you run out of ideas after the 10 year anniversary? Very poor rewards for such an old game mode and the regulars playing it. I agree with @Nintend064
Does that mean ARAM should be removed too?  It's just a luck-fest and takes away focus from the main game.  It's not right or fair if Dominion and Twisted Treeline are removed but ARAM gets to stay.
Does this mean all modes of Treeline? So for example if I have 50 normal games and 50 in ranked flex does that count as 100 total or is it mode specific?
aw, I get none because life and it starts after like 5:30pm or something

Bye bye Twisted Treeline! I'm sad to see you go...

I played my first ever game of League on TT way back in 2012. Attack speed Janna didn't work out so well for me or my team but here I am all these years later saying farewell! 
A little piece of my history will be buried with you.

{{item:3070}} {{champion:40}} {{item:3070}}
How long the for the patch 9.23? anybody knows? and it still open at the weekend in the patch for 100games?{{summoner:31}}
